schema.name: Healthyfied Balsamic Cabbage  Slaw

recipeInstructions.text: Thinly slice the green cabbage, dice the red onion, and thaw the corn if using frozen.
In a large mixing bowl, combine the sliced cabbage, diced onion, and corn.
Drizzle the coconut balsamic vinegar over the cabbage mixture and toss everything together until well coated. Let it sit for 5 minutes to allow the flavors to meld.
Serve the slaw as a refreshing side dish to your favorite meals.

schema.description: Dive into a healthful journey with our Healthyfied Balsamic Cabbage Slaw, perfectly curated for those who follow a low-carb, low-sodium, and low-sugar diet. This recipe brings a new twist to healthy eating, making it an ideal addition to your collection of Healthy Recipes and Healthified Recipes.
